name: A Murmur in the Trees
description:
A Murmur in the Trees is a short, mystery adventure set in the woods of prohibition-era America. Play as a reporter sent into the mysterious woods of Lonesome Falls. A local woman claims to have information about the recent 'Moonshine Murders', but you'll have to find her to hear what she knows.

Key Details:
  • Explore the mysterious forest of Lonesome Falls.

  • Solve simple puzzles to progress the story.

  • Interact with residents of the area through branching dialogue.

  • Make decisions with consequences.
